dc_title_s: Alternative Fuel - Compressed Natural Gas Fuel Stations: Maryland
dc_description_s: This is a MD iMAP hosted service layer. Find more information at http://imap.maryland.gov. Through a nationwide network of local coalitions, Clean Cities provides project assistance to help stakeholders in the public and private sectors deploy alternative and renewable fuels, idle-reduction measures, fuel economy improvements, and emerging transportation technologies. Department of Energy collects this data as part of the Projects undertaken by Clean Cities coalitions and stakeholders to ensure customers access to clean alternative energy. This data can be found at the Department of Energy Alternative Fuels Data Center Web Feature Service: http://www. afdc. energy. gov/locator/stations/Clean Cities is the deployment arm of the U. S. Department of Energy's (DOE) Vehicle Technologies Office. Last Updated: 07/2016
